author: Special Correspondent
text: Andhra Bank has opened a Navashakthi Branch at Vadavalli and it is the 80{+t}{+h}branch of the bank in the zone. According to a press release, the zone covers 79 branches in 23 districts. It has a total business of Rs. 5000 crore and a dedicated retail loan express and SME cell. In Coimbatore Zone, the bank has disbursed over 2,000 MUDRA loans totalling more than Rs. 9 crore
title: Bank branch opened
